title: RoboSpace Robot Configuration
description: Configuration file for loading robots from URDF with frame corrections. Units: length in mm, angles in degrees.

$schema.description: Reference to this schema for IDE support

model.description: Path to URDF/model file (relative to this config file)

base_frame.description: Transform from world to robot base. Use for REP-103 corrections or robot placement.

flange_frame.description: Transform from last link to tool flange. Usually identity.

flange_link.description: Name of the flange/tool0 link in URDF. Auto-detected if not specified.

frame.description: 6-DOF frame pose. Units: xyz in mm, angles in degrees.

rpy.description: Rotation [roll, pitch, yaw] in degrees. Applied as Rz(yaw) * Ry(pitch) * Rx(roll).

quaternion.description: Rotation as quaternion [w, x, y, z]. Alternative to rpy.
